title: How to cite a scholarly article in APA with multiple authors - Quora

response.answer_text: Hi. I second all the replies to the query and endorse following the Purdue or any other authoritative content if done manually. However, I found it easier to use tools such as Zotero, Mendeley and similar others; thay can also help access research content (eg. lit review). Try them. It helps save time and energy that could be used more effectively towards core work.
Your question is not very clear. Do you mean that several authors wrote one article together?
